newsitem.title: GERMANY: Isar-Amperwerke to pay unchanged dividend.
newsitem.headline: Isar-Amperwerke to pay unchanged dividend.

text.p: German power company Isar-Amperwerke AG said on Tuesday it expected to pay a 1995-96 dividend of 10 marks for every 50-mark share held, the same amount it paid a year ago.
The dividend for the fiscal year that ended June 30 will cost a total of 376 million marks -- also unchanged on the 1994-95 business year, the company said.
Isar-Amperwerke releases 1995-96 results on Wednesday. A year ago the company reported revenue of 2.2 billion marks in and net profit of 93.1 million marks.
